ingredients.item: 150g pack Waitrose Hot Smoked Scottish Salmon Slices, flaked
1 tbsp capers, drained, rinsed and chopped

instructions.step: Cook the pasta in boiling water for 4 minutes, drain and return to the pan.
Meanwhile, whisk together the oil, lemon zest and juice and the Dijon. Stir into the pasta together with the salmon, salad onions, capers and dill. Season and serve.
